description:
Noah lives with his wife Naameh and sons Shem, Ham and Japheth in a desolate land where men persecute and kill each other. One day, Noah receives a message from the Creator that must find Methuselah. During the journey he ends up saving the life of the young Ila, who has a serious wound in the belly. By finding Methuselah, Noah discovers he has the task of building a huge ark, which will house the animals during a flood that will end life on earth, so that the vision of the Creator may be, finally rescued.
